rukus.text: luʿina alladhina kafaru min bani is'raila ʿala lisani dawuda waʿisa ib'ni maryama dhalika bima ʿasaw wakanu yaʿtaduna
kanu la yatanahawna ʿan munkarin faʿaluhu labi'sa ma kanu yafʿaluna
tara kathiran min'hum yatawallawna alladhina kafaru labi'sa ma qaddamat lahum anfusuhum an sakhita l-lahu ʿalayhim wafi l-ʿadhabi hum khaliduna
walaw kanu yu'minuna bil-lahi wal-nabiyi wama unzila ilayhi ma ittakhadhuhum awliyaa walakinna kathiran min'hum fasiquna

latajidanna ashadda l-nasi ʿadawatan lilladhina amanu l-yahuda wa-alladhina ashraku walatajidanna aqrabahum mawaddatan lilladhina amanu alladhina qalu inna nasara dhalika bi-anna min'hum qissisina waruh'banan wa-annahum la yastakbiruna
wa-idha samiʿu ma unzila ila l-rasuli tara aʿyunahum tafidu mina l-damʿi mimma ʿarafu mina l-haqi yaquluna rabbana amanna fa-uk'tub'na maʿa l-shahidina
wama lana la nu'minu bil-lahi wama jaana mina l-haqi wanatmaʿu an yud'khilana rabbuna maʿa l-qawmi l-salihina
fa-athabahumu l-lahu bima qalu jannatin tajri min tahtiha l-anharu khalidina fiha wadhalika jazau l-muh'sinina
wa-alladhina kafaru wakadhabu biayatina ulaika ashabu l-jahimi
